meanings.definition: Not deviating or changing in direction or purpose
meanings.sent1: Her unswerving dedication to her studies led to excellent grades.
meanings.sent2: The unswerving path of the river carved through the mountains over centuries.
meanings.sent3: The unswerving squirrel kept stealing nuts from the same tree every day.
meanings.sent4: His unswerving determination to succeed was like a powerful engine driving him forward.
meanings.sent5: The unswerving commitment of the team ensured they reached their goal without fail.

meanings.definition: Firm and steady in purpose or loyalty
meanings.sent1: The unswerving support of her friends helped her through tough times.
meanings.sent2: His unswerving loyalty to his country was unwavering.
meanings.sent3: The unswerving cat always greeted its owner with a purr and a rub.
meanings.sent4: Her unswerving dedication to her family was like a rock in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The unswerving trust between them was the foundation of their strong relationship.
